data.title: Prague → Berlin Oranienburger Straße by Train
data.meta_description: Travel by train from Prague to Berlin Oranienburger Straße in 4h 21m. Get train times, compare prices & buy cheap train tickets for Prague to Berlin Oranienburger Straße today.
data.text:
Thinking about taking the train from Prague to Berlin Oranienburger Straße? We’ve got you covered.

It usually takes around 4 hours 29 minutes to travel the 175 miles (281 km) from Prague to Berlin Oranienburger Straße by train, although you can get there in as little as 4 hours 21 minutes on the fastest services. You’ll normally find around 7 trains per day running on this route. You’ll need to make 1 change along the way as there aren't any direct services on this line. You can travel with Regiojet trains during your journey, as they are the main operator of services on this route.

Train tickets from Prague to Berlin Oranienburger Straße are usually cheaper when you book in advance compared to buying them on the day. Start a search in our Journey Planner to check out the latest prices.

Keen to book your train tickets to Berlin Oranienburger Straße? No need to wait, start a search with us today! If you want to find out a bit more about the journey first, you can find our train timetable below, tips on booking cheap tickets and our FAQs, including first and last train times.
